item.title: A Daughter's Secret
item.description: Chapter 1 The dark and cold grabbed me and held me prisoner for a moment as the phone rang. Shaking my head to clear the cobwebs, I finally found the lamp switch and light flooded my bedroom. Taking a deep breath, I picked up the phone and heard a voice ask, “Mr. Lanford, Mr. Lanford, are you awake?” Pausing for a moment, I replied, “Yes this is Lanford. Who is this?
